'''A Minecraft Movie Hero Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|a-minecraft-movie-hero-pack|A MINECRAFT MOVIE Hero Pack|March 3, 2025|Cristina Anderca}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 5 skins of characters from ''[[A Minecraft Movie]]''.
